text: Gradsteinia is a genus of moss in family Amblystegiaceae.Buck, William R. & Bernard Goffinet. 2000. "Morphology and classification of mosses", pages 71-123 in A. Jonathan Shaw & Bernard Goffinet (Eds.), Bryophyte Biology. (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press). . It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Gradsteinia torrenticola, Ochyra, C.Schmidt & Bültmann ==References== Category:Hypnales Category:Moss genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Gradsteinia
